snippet: The European Union has been under fire over a measure that requires foreign airlines to abide by a new system to fight greenhouse gas emissions. Now an Indian official has warned the dispute could disrupt wider climate-change talks.
abstract: The European Union has been under fire over a measure that requires foreign airlines to abide by a new system to fight greenhouse gas emissions. Now an Indian official has warned the dispute could disrupt wider climate-change talks.

headline.main: Signs Europe Bending on Airline Carbon Fee
